title: The Weeknd keeps a low profile in gold as Bella Hadid celebrates 23rd birthday... after taking break
text:
Bella Hadid had a great day Wednesday as she celebrated her 23rd birthday with friends and family.

But it remains to be seen how her ex The Weeknd (aka Abel Tesfaye) fared, given their recent split.

Tesfaye was spotted keeping a low profile in New York City, while Hadid commenced the festivities close by.

Low profile: The Weeknd was spotted Wednesday keeping a low profile in New York City, while ex Bella Hadid celebrated her 23rd birthday close by

He stepped out in a gold bomber jacket trimmed in red, as he headed into a recording studio.

It was buttoned up and completed with some black skinny pants and a pair of yellow trainers.

The 29-year-old kept his head down as he sported a black cap and took a phone call while walking to his car.

The day before, he was spotted out and about trying to stay incognito in a camouflage jacket.

Stay gold: He stepped out in a gold bomber jacket trimmed in red, as he headed into a recording studio

Busy day: The 29-year-old kept his head down as he sported a black cap and took a phone call while walking to his car

Incognito: The day before, he was spotted out and about trying to stay incognito in a camouflage jacket

Hadid was spotted nearby Wednesday in Greenwich Village as she celebrated her birthday with friends and family at Sadelle's.

She cut a chic look in a slim belted black coat over a matching mini dress, with knee-high stockings and leather creepers.

The supermodel completed the look with some thin oval sunglasses and gold hoop earrings.

Her mom Yolanda took to Instagram with photos of them celebrating with sister Gigi, brother Anwar and his girlfriend Dua Lipa.

Birthday girl: Hadid was spotted nearby in Greenwich Village as she celebrated her birthday with friends and family at Sadelle's

Back in black: She cut a chic look in a slim belted black coat over a matching mini dress, with knee-high stockings and leather creepers. The supermodel completed the look with some thin oval sunglasses and gold hoop earrings

Festivities begin: Her mom Yolanda took to Instagram with photos of them celebrating with sister Gigi, brother Anwar and his girlfriend Dua Lipa

Party dress: Bella later stepped out in another dazzling birthday look, donning a red velvet dress for more festivities at Miss Lily's, also in the Village

Bella later stepped out in another dazzling birthday look for more festivities at Miss Lily's, also in the Village.

The birthday girl sported a skintight sleeveless red velvet dress with a turtleneck, paired with black knee-high alligator boots.

She and Tesfaye were rumored to be taking a break in August, as a source told E! News: 'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally.'

'Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut.'

The couple originally dated from 2015 to 2016, before getting back together in 2018, until their recent rumored split.

Taking a break: She and Tesfaye were rumored to be taking a break in August: 'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally;' pictured November 8, 2018 in NYC
description: He and Hadid were rumored to be taking a break in August after first breaking up in 2016 and getting back together in 2018: 'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally.'
